fields.summary: maven-plugin-api:3.0.3 uses different version of org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
we use the maven-plugin-api 3.0.3 in our project and as you can see this has different versions of transient dependencies of plexus-utils.

[WARNING] Rule 2: org.apache.maven.plugins.enforcer.RequireUpperBoundDeps failed with message:
Failed while enforcing RequireUpperBoundDeps. The error(s) are [
Require upper bound dependencies error for org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils:2.0.6 paths to dependency are:
+-org.drools:drools-maven-plugin:6.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  +-org.apache.maven:maven-plugin-api:3.0.3
    +-org.apache.maven:maven-model:3.0.3
      +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils:2.0.6
and
+-org.drools:drools-maven-plugin:6.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  +-org.apache.maven:maven-plugin-api:3.0.3
    +-org.apache.maven:maven-artifact:3.0.3
      +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils:2.0.6
and
+-org.drools:drools-maven-plugin:6.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  +-org.apache.maven:maven-plugin-api:3.0.3
    +-org.sonatype.sisu:sisu-inject-plexus:2.1.1
      +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils:2.0.5
and
+-org.drools:drools-maven-plugin:6.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  +-org.apache.maven.plugin-testing:maven-plugin-testing-harness:2.1
    +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-archiver:2.2
      +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils:3.0.7
and
+-org.drools:drools-maven-plugin:6.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  +-org.apache.maven.plugin-testing:maven-plugin-testing-harness:2.1
    +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-archiver:2.2
      +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-container-default:1.0-alpha-9-stable-1
        +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils:1.0.4
and
+-org.drools:drools-maven-plugin:6.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  +-org.apache.maven.plugin-testing:maven-plugin-testing-harness:2.1
    +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-archiver:2.2
      +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-io:2.0.4
        +-org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-utils:3.0

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
